system.description:
This spell outlines one or more creatures or objects with a pale, flickering, greenish fire, which does not cause damage. The outlined creatures or objects become more visible, granting a +2 bonus to attack rolls against them. The druid can outline one man-sized creature for each 5 levels of experience, up to a maximum of 48 feet of fire at 20th level.

The objects or creatures need only be detected in some way (such as by sight, or a detect invisible spell) to be the object of this spell.
